com.zpaper.gateway

Class ZippiProxyServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.mitre.dsmiley.httpproxy.ProxyServlet
          • com.zpaper.gateway.ZPaperProxyServlet
            • com.zpaper.gateway.ZippiProxyServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class ZippiProxyServlet
extends ZPaperProxyServlet
    An extension of the ZPaperProxyServlet, this module provides the HttpHost from the request parameters. This class also adds the X-API-Key, X-API-User and X-Z_SFUser parameters if necessary.

    NOTES:

    • Test with: curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'X-Z-SFuser: zpaper@mckesson.com.nov.dev' --header 'X-API-Key: Hfr1eIVan5aqCDxBZswEQYZ61kiJC0LXRc8CEGhrDWh2DEtY/e1X8O2N3Prd+QPP' 'https://dev-gw.zpaper.com/zippi/groups/-20200'
    • Test with: curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'X-Z-SFuser: cory.newey@zpaper.com.devthree' --header 'X-API-Token: 00D4W000002V5fg.2B79D36CA188E65F8953FCC97B0856FD.1652186116746' 'https://dev-gw.zpaper.com/zippi/echo/'
    • Test with: curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'https://dev-gw.zpaper.com/zippi/echo?SFsession=00D500000006bU5!AQMAQLKOz1cbv99vRRBVV3Bj0f7iwamEnIdq1bfCgZUWNqIQFkzsBs4IuwHwsXDYf3O67tasAUi6CcIOoNGPCpynNr0NkH.o'
    • 2020-04-21 Added support for channel parameter lookup. X-API-Key header will be set if missing.
    • 2022-05-09 Added support for X-API-Token parameter lookup. X-API-Key, X-API-User,a nd X-Z-SFUser header will be set if missing.
    Since:
    1.3
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • copyRequestHeaders

        protected void copyRequestHeaders(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest,
                                  org.apache.http.HttpRequest proxyRequest)
        Overrides the ProxyServlet.copyRequestHeaders(HttpServletRequest, HttpRequest) to add the X-API-Key, X-API-User, and X-Z-SFuser(deprecated) headers to the proxied request if not already set. Also, If the authorization header is blank and the SFsession query parameter is present then set the authorization header as : "bearer <sfSessionId>".
        Overrides:
        copyRequestHeaders in class org.mitre.dsmiley.httpproxy.ProxyServlet
        Parameters:
        servletRequest - The source servletRequest
        proxyRequest - The destination servletRequest

      • getHttpHost

        org.apache.http.HttpHost getHttpHost(CustomHttpServletRequestWrapper servletRequest)
                              throws IOException
        Returns the HttpHost from the information stored in the request.
        1. If the X-API-Key header is supplied then it is the authority for routing.
        2. If the X-API-Token is supplied then that is the authority for routing.
        3. If the zt parameter is supplied then that is the authority for routing.
        4. If the channel parameter is supplied then that is the authority for routing.
        5. If the SFsession parameter is supplied then that is the authority for routing, and may also be used as the bearer token value for an authorization header.
        If the Deployment record is found using one of the above values then extract the Server__c, zippiKey__c, and Primary_User_Login__c from the Deployment record to use in copyRequestHeaders(HttpServletRequest, HttpRequest).
        Specified by:
        getHttpHost in class ZPaperProxyServlet
        Parameters:
        servletRequest - The CustomHttpServletRequestWrapper containing the parameters and body
        Returns:
        the HttpHost from the information stored in the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getJSONNodeAsString

        public String getJSONNodeAsString(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode deploymentField)
